name: Toronto Sketch Comedy Festival
description:
Returning for its 21st edition, featuring over 70 shows and over 75 comedy troupes!

We're showcasing the best contemporary sketch comedy, musical comedy, drag, storytelling, and clown from across North America, plus the ninth annual Film Festival presented by New Metric Media.

Highlights include headliner performances by Sex T-Rex, Jon Blair, BDB Comedy, and Tita Collective, plus a full day of International Women's Day programming, featuring all female and non-binary performers.
